key: llm_assess:sweetgreen - Healthy Salads, Bowls and Plates:gluten:5377275736866325058

data.reasoning: Sweetgreen presents a moderate risk for individuals with celiac disease due to the presence of gluten-containing ingredients and potential for cross-contamination. Several menu items contain gluten, including the Kale Caesar (parmesan crisps, caesar dressing *may contain gluten*), Buffalo Chicken (garlic breadcrumbs), Chicken Pesto Parm (zaatar breadcrumbs), and Rosemary Focaccia. Although some bowls may appear gluten-free at first glance (e.g., Harvest Bowl, Shroomami), the lack of dedicated gluten-free preparation spaces and equipment increases the risk of cross-contamination. The menu doesn't explicitly advertise gluten-free preparation protocols. While the Guacamole Greens bowl appears to be gluten-free based on ingredients alone, cross-contamination remains a significant concern.
risk_factors: Zaatar breadcrumbs in Chicken Pesto Parm
Tortilla chips in Guacamole Greens *may* contain gluten
safe_alternatives: Guacamole Greens (request no tortilla chips and confirm vinaigrette ingredients)
Harvest Bowl (request without apples, as some apples are coated with gluten-containing wax)
Shroomami (confirm miso sesame ginger sauce is gluten-free)
Custom bowls (with careful ingredient selection and explicit communication about allergy needs)
